Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.scenes

Class DynamicScene

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.scenes.StaticScene
com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.scenes.DynamicScene
All Implemented Interfaces:
Activatable, Clearable, DependencyInjector, Destroyable, Effectable, TileMapListProvider, Initializable, DimensionsProvider, EntityCollectionSupplier, EntitySpawnerListProvider, SupplierProvider, YaegerScene, TimerListProvider, Updatable, UpdateDelegator
Direct Known Subclasses:
SplashScene
public abstract class DynamicScene
extends StaticScene
implements UpdateDelegator, TimerListProvider, EntitySpawnerListProvider
Instantiate a new DynamicScene. A DynamicScene extends a StaticScene, but adds its own Gameloop.
